products.title: Vitra Blackout Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra blackout cream electric roller blind in cream. Made to measure from 123.62 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Vitra blackout is one of their most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. 
 Revamp your home or office space with a stunning vitra blackout cream roller blind.The electric feature makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach. 
 
 Product id: db-erbx0526 fabric colour: cream material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
